item.description:
Here's the scoop on the Marathon guys...it starts Saturday at 6pm at ImprovBoston and goes all the way through to Sunday after 8pm. Come for part of it or come for all. Marathon passes are $20 and $10 tickets are available for select shows!

Here's the links and please please please pass it along to anyone who might be interested in going!

http://www.improvbost... - Error on site here, passes are good from 6pm on.

http://www.facebook.c...

And hey def friend me on the FB if we arent friends already! I hope some of you watch South Park haha.

Looking forward to seeing a ton of you this weekend, some great laughs ahead and then I'm running the Boston Marathon on Monday. If you would like more info on that check out www.firstgiving.com/jasonjruns

Cheers!

Jason
item.name: The.Boston.Improv.Comedy.Marathon - 26.2 hours of laughter! Run the funny!
